title: Can new NASA carbon to oxygen conversion technology like MOXIE be used to address climate change?
body: Since MOXIE works by ingesting carbon dioxide that’s mostly driving climate change here on Earth and produces oxygen, a lot of people wondered whether it could it be helpful on our own planet. But while technology is part of any plan for addressing climate change, the conversion that MOXIE accomplished on Mars is not a viable approach.
author: 0x552E66E3B9ec27d67A8326993A2580aEAB7798a0
